Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.smarthome.core.scheduler.ScheduledCompletableFuture

  • Packages that use ScheduledCompletableFuture 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.scheduler  

    • Uses of ScheduledCompletableFuture in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.scheduler

      Methods in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.scheduler that return ScheduledCompletableFuture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.after(Callable<T> callable, Duration delay)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves after delaying with the result of the call that is executed after the delay.
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<Instant> Scheduler.after(Duration delay)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that will resolve after the given duration.
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.at(Callable<T> callable, Instant instant)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves at the given epochTime with the result of the call.
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<Instant> Scheduler.at(Instant instant)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves at the given epochTime
      default ScheduledCompletableFuture<Void> Scheduler.at(SchedulerRunnable runnable, Instant instant)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves at the given epochTime and runs the runnable.
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.before(CompletableFuture<T> promise, Duration timeout)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that fails with a TimeoutException when the given CompletableFuture is not resolved before the given timeout.
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<Void> CronScheduler.schedule(CronJob cronJob, Map<String,Object> config, String cronExpression)
      Schedule a runnable to be executed for the give cron expression (See CronJob).
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> PeriodicScheduler.schedule(SchedulerRunnable runnable, Duration... delays)
      Schedule a runnable to be executed in definitely at the given delays.
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.schedule(SchedulerRunnable callable, SchedulerTemporalAdjuster temporalAdjuster)
      Schedules the callable once or repeating using the temporalAdjuster to determine the time the callable should run.
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<Void> CronScheduler.schedule(SchedulerRunnable runnable, String cronExpression)
      Schedule a runnable to be executed for the give cron expression (See CronJob).
